caption: Two little boys were playing together, both wearing straw hats. Tragically, one of the boys was eventually killed. This prompted the surviving boy, now a man, to run through a graveyard, desperately searching for clues and information related to the incident. Meanwhile, another man was trapped in a well, on the brink of death. As the man in the well reminisced about the past, the first man located the woman in white in a room. He confided in her, sharing everything he'd experienced and learned. Overwhelmed with emotion, the woman wept and embraced him. In the end, the man trapped in the well was rescued, pulled to safety with the help of a rope.
